(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN man))
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP UK))))
      (VP (VBZ brings)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB eat)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NNP Burger))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (NNP Singapore)))))))
        (, ,)))))


advmod(brings-7, When-1)
det(man-3, a-2)
nsubj(brings-7, man-3)
prep(man-3, from-4)
det(UK-6, the-5)
pobj(from-4, UK-6)
root(ROOT-0, brings-7)
dobj(brings-7, you-8)
aux(eat-10, to-9)
xcomp(brings-7, eat-10)
det(Burger-12, a-11)
dobj(eat-10, Burger-12)
prep(Burger-12, in-13)
pobj(in-13, Singapore-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP one))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB wonder)
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP what))
              (S
                (NP (DT the) (NNS fuss))
                (VP (VBZ is) (RB all)
                  (ADJP (IN about)))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT This))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Big) (NNP MOG) (POS 's))
          (JJ favorite) (NN burger))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP he))
      (ADVP (RB proudly))
      (VP (VBZ claims)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
              (VP (VB get)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ nicer) (NN burger))
                (PP (IN than)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT this))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (NNP Britain)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ happy)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB include)
              (NP (DT this) (NNP Burger))
              (PP (IN into)
                (NP
                  (NP (PRP$ my) (NN list))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP Burgers)))))
              (SBAR (IN because)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (VP (VBZ gets)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN award))
                      (PP (IN for)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ thickest) (NN pattie))
                          (SBAR
                            (S
                              (NP (PRP I))
                              (VP (VBP have)
                                (ADVP (RB ever))
                                (VP (VBN come)
                                  (PRT (RP across)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ 2oog) (NN pattie))
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VB mince)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (NP (PRP themselves)))))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ thick))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD can)
            (ADVP (RB almost))
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN described)
                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP (DT an) (NNP Xtra) (NNP Huge) (NNP Meatball)))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN cafe))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBN situated)
          (ADVP (JJ next))
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (DT the) (NN river))))))

      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ 's)

            (NP (DT the) (NN place))

              (VP (VBN filled)

    (. .)))
